info.title: Freebase Search
info.description: Find Freebase entities using textual queries and other constraints.

get.description: Reconcile entities to Freebase open data.

parameters.name: confidence
parameters.description: Required confidence for a candidate to match. Must be between .5 and 1.0

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Classifications of entity e.g. type, category, title.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Languages for names and values. First language is used for display. Default is 'en'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of candidates to return.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of entity.

parameters.name: prop
parameters.description:
Property values for entity formatted as
:

parameters.name: as_of_time
parameters.description: A mql as_of_time value to use with mql_output queries.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: JS method name for JSONP callbacks.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor value to use for the next page of results.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Restrict to topics with this Freebase domain id.

parameters.name: encode
parameters.description: The encoding of the response. You can use this parameter to enable html encoding.

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description: Query on exact name and keys only.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A filter to apply to the query.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Structural format of the json response.

parameters.name: help
parameters.description: The keyword to request help on.

parameters.name: indent
parameters.description: Whether to indent the json results or not.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The code of the language to run the query with. Default is 'en'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: mid
parameters.description: A mid to use instead of a query.

parameters.name: mql_output
parameters.description: The MQL query to run againist the results to extract more data.

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: An output expression to request data from matches.

parameters.name: prefixed
parameters.description: Prefix match against names and aliases.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query term to search for.

parameters.name: scoring
parameters.description: Relevance scoring algorithm to use.

parameters.name: spell
parameters.description: Request 'did you mean' suggestions

parameters.name: stemmed
parameters.description: Query on stemmed names and aliases. May not be used with prefixed.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Restrict to topics with this Freebase type id.

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: A rule to match against.

parameters.name: without
parameters.description: A rule to not match against.

confidence.description: Percentage likelihood that this candidate is the unique matching entity. Value will be between 0.0 and 1.0

lang.description: Language code that candidate and notable names are displayed in.

name.description: Freebase name of matching entity in specified language.

notable.description: Type or profession the candidate is notable for.

name.description: Name of notable category in specified language.

candidate.description: If filled, then the listed candidates are potential matches, and such should be evaluated by a more discerning algorithm or human. The matches are ordered by confidence.

match.description: If filled, this entity is guaranteed to match at requested confidence probability (default 99%).

warning.description: If filled, then there were recoverable problems that affected the request. For example, some of the properties were ignored because they either are not valid Freebase predicates or are not indexed for reconciliation. The candidates returned should be considered valid results, with the caveat that sections of the request were ignored as specified by the warning text.

location.description: Location of warning in the request e.g. invalid predicate.

message.description: Warning message to display to the user.

reason.description: Code for identifying classes of warnings.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.name: key
key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.name: oauth_token
oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.name: prettyPrint
prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.name: quotaUser
quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.name: userIp
userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.
